hebideyah uberstank

2002-11-11

i can't seem to do anything that i am supposed to be doing. which is fine for my ibiblio projects and other assorted random crap, but not so good for my thesis or censorship research paper. ah lordy.

speaking of censorship, does anybody have a copy of i am curious - yellow
that i can borrow? the trial surrounding the blocking of the importation
of this film is what i'm going to do research on.

ok peace yall... ps http://kids.forresto.com/ [was a proto-flickr photo sharing site]
